participant_1.background:
I love to dance ballet but I'm not sure if my parents would approve.
i love children.
my favorite artist is guns and roses.
On rainy days, I love to look at my collection of cycling-related items and think about my father.
I am passionate about being a good dog parent to my collie.

participant_2.background:
My family and I have different goals, but we get along well.
I live in a city where I can always find a basketball court.
i have a girlfriend named luis , and she goes to my college.
i work in tv.
someday i with to become a famous animator and work for a big company like dreamworks.

content.text: Hi! What are your goals in life?
I want to be an animator and work for a big company like dreamworks
That's awesome! I love animation and I'm sure you'll do great!
Thanks! I work in tv now so I'm on the right track
That's so cool! What's your favorite show to work on?
I work on a lot of different shows but my favorite is one called "the amazing world of gumball"
Oh I love that show! I'm a big fan of cartoons
Me too! I grew up watching cartoons and now I get to make them for a living
That's amazing! I wish I could do that
You totally could! You just have to practice your drawing and animation skills
I'll try! Thanks for the encouragement
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about animation
What's your favorite part about being an animator?
I love being able to bring characters to life and see them come to life on screen
That's so cool! I can't imagine how amazing that must feel
It's the best feeling in the world! I'm so glad I get to do what I love
I'm so happy for you! You deserve it
